version_description:
1.Added team voting function. You can vote for your loved team when you watch the event and get the team badge!
2.Added the event center result display function, you can see the score of the finished event in the Esports Center~

1.Added team voting function. You can vote for your loved team when you watch the event and get the team badge!
2.Added the event center result display function, you can see the score of the finished event in the Esports Center~

1.Added team voting function. You can vote for your loved team when you watch the event and get the team badge!
2.Added the event center result display function, you can see the score of the finished event in the Esports Center~

1. Added coin system and  coin gift which is free as long as you watch livestream.
2. Added consumer rankings, come on and become the leader of your followed streamers!

1.Added Message Center to view messages from system and activities
2.Now you can find the online streamers in the live list much easier now!
3.You can find the livestream which is language-friendly to you at the homepage much easier now.
4.Added notification ringtone

1.Added Message Center to view messages from system and activities
2.Now you can find the online streamers in the live list much easier now!
3.You can find the livestream which is language-friendly to you at the homepage much easier now.
4.Added notification ringtone

1.Added Message Center to view messages from system and activities
2.Now you can find the online streamers in the live list much easier now!
3.You can find the livestream which is language-friendly to you at the homepage much easier now.
4.Added notification ringtone

1. Added 1080p quality. Enjoy HD quality now.
2.The Treasure Box will continue timing when you back to the livestream again.

2.The Treasure Box will continue timing when you back to the livestream again.

1. Added 1080p quality. Enjoy HD quality now.
2.The Treasure Box will continue timing when you back to the livestream again.

1.Add the lottery function. You can now participate in the draw initiated by the streamer through sharing or speaking, and get a Diamonds or customized rewards!
2.Add the speech copy function. Just click on other people to speak, copy and send the same message!
3.Add the hot word function. You can now send current hot words with just one click. Send your messages one step faster!
4.Added the sharpness memory function. You can now remember the video quality of your last activity!

1. Added betting game: spectate live betting and potentially win gold coins!

3. Added video like and share videos features; 
4. Added special entrance effects for top leaderboard users in streams.

1. Fan Leaderboard is just anounced. Check if your are the most intimate fan of the streamer.

3. Repair the stream problem, that the stream will be cut off suddenly sometimes.
